title: VIGILANT Weekly Update
desc: This weekly update introduces new members of the VIGILANT research team and summarizes the current progress of the project, including recent technical milestones and upcoming publication plans.

research.title: VIGILANT Weekly Team Meeting
research.desc: Four new researchers from Professor Yoon Guk-jin’s laboratory have officially joined the VIGILANT project. The team has successfully completed improvements to the Neural Network and Reinforcement Learning policy, achieving performance comparable to a fixed-camera baseline. Based on these results, the team is currently preparing a paper for submission to IROS, with a target submission date in early March.
